text: John Lewis Peck (July 6, 1857 – January 14, 1927) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Albert party representing Albert County from 1917 to 1927. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1857 births Category:1927 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: John L. Peck
